com.adobe.cq.social.commons.events

Class CommentEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osgi.service.event.Event
      • com.adobe.cq.social.scf.core.SocialEvent<CommentEvent.CommentActions>
        • com.adobe.cq.social.commons.events.CommentEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CommentEvent
extends SocialEvent<CommentEvent.CommentActions>
    Defines events that are triggered in a comment system.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        comment - - the comment node on which the event was triggered

      • getCommentSystemPath

        public java.lang.String getCommentSystemPath()

      • fromEvent

        public static CommentEvent fromEvent(org.osgi.service.event.Event event)
        Retrieves the comment event from the given generic Event.
        Parameters:
        event - The event.
        Returns:
        The comment event or null if the given event is not a comment event.
